title: Boromir, My Brother (4R111)
text:

Card Type:	Condition

Game Text:	Bearer must be Faramir. Skirmish: Discard a [Gondor] card from hand to make a Ringbound Man strength +1.
Lore:	”'Where is thy horn? Whither goest thou? O Boromir! But he was gone.'”
